attributes.action: launch an independent enquiry into the repeal of the Treason Act and the implementation of the Lisbon treaty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If there is a conflict of interests, the government should remove the inplementation of the Lisburn treaty and reinstate the Treason Act. Politicians go on about transparency of Parliament but this would be similar to Vichy France.
